name: A high standard of living, quality of life and well-being for all citizens
description: Eradicate extreme poverty and reduce inequality through inclusive growth.
target_2063: No person living below the poverty line; per capita income of $12,000+

name: Well educated citizens and skills revolution underpinned by science, technology and innovation
description: Ensure universal access to quality education and lifelong learning.
target_2063: 100% adult literacy; 70%+ tertiary enrollment

name: Healthy and well-nourished citizens
description: Ensure universal access to quality health care and nutrition.
target_2063: Life expectancy of 75+ years; reduce maternal mortality to <50 per 100,000

name: Transformed economies
description: Structural transformation of economies through industrialization and value addition.
target_2063: Manufacturing as 50%+ of GDP; intra-African trade at 50%+

name: Modern agriculture for increased productivity and production
description: Agricultural modernization for food security and prosperity.
target_2063: Modernized agriculture with 10%+ annual growth in output

name: Blue/ocean economy for accelerated economic growth
description: Harness marine and aquatic resources for sustainable economic growth.
target_2063: Blue economy contributing significantly to continental GDP

name: Environmentally sustainable and climate resilient economies and communities
description: Build climate-resilient economies and communities.
target_2063: Climate-resilient economies; 50%+ renewable energy

name: United Africa (Federal or Confederate)
description: Accelerate political and economic integration towards a united Africa.
target_2063: Continental financial and monetary institutions established

name: Continental financial and monetary institutions established and functional
description: Create continental financial institutions for economic integration.
target_2063: African Central Bank, African Monetary Fund, African Investment Bank operational

name: World-class infrastructure criss-crosses Africa
description: Develop world-class infrastructure â€” transport, energy, ICT, water.
target_2063: Universal broadband access; 100% electricity access

name: Democratic values, practices, universal principles of human rights, justice and the rule of law entrenched
description: Entrench democratic governance and human rights across the continent.
target_2063: All AU member states upholding democratic governance and rule of law

name: Capable institutions and transformative leadership in place
description: Build capable, accountable institutions at all levels.
target_2063: Effective, accountable, and transparent institutions at all levels

name: Peace, security and stability is preserved
description: Silence the guns and end all wars, civil conflicts, and violence.
target_2063: A conflict-free Africa; all guns silenced

name: A stable and peaceful Africa
description: Maintain stability and peace through conflict prevention mechanisms.
target_2063: Fully functional African Peace and Security Architecture

name: A fully functional and operational African Peace and Security Architecture
description: Operationalize the African Peace and Security Architecture.
target_2063: Fully operational APSA with rapid response capability

name: African cultural renaissance is pre-eminent
description: Promote Pan-African cultural values, heritage and creative arts.
target_2063: Vibrant creative industry contributing 5%+ to GDP

name: Full gender equality in all spheres of life
description: Achieve gender parity in political, economic, and social spheres.
target_2063: 50% women in public institutions; eliminate gender-based violence

name: Engaged and empowered youth and children
description: Ensure youth are fully engaged, empowered and at the center of development.
target_2063: Youth unemployment <6%; universal secondary education

name: Africa as a major partner in global affairs and peaceful co-existence
description: Ensure Africa is a strong partner in global governance.
target_2063: Africa speaks with one voice on global issues; permanent UNSC seat

name: Africa takes full responsibility for financing her development
description: Mobilize domestic resources and reduce dependency on external aid.
target_2063: 75%+ of development financing from domestic resources
